trans-unit.source: Specifies the override behavior of a configuration element for configuration elements in child directories.

Use the <xref:System.Configuration.OverrideMode> enumeration values to set the <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.OverrideMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation> class.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Configuration.OverrideMode> valores de enumeração para definir o <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.OverrideMode%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation> classe.

trans-unit.source: You set this property in order to programmatically specify override behavior of a configuration element or group.
trans-unit.target: Defina essa propriedade para especificar comportamento de substituição de um elemento de configuração ou o grupo de forma programática.

trans-unit.source: To declaratively set the override behavior for all configuration elements inside a element, use the `allowOverride` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Para definir declarativamente o comportamento de substituição para todos os elementos de configuração dentro de um elemento, use o `allowOverride` atributo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.OverrideMode%2A> property gives you more granular control over the elements inside a `location` element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.OverrideMode%2A> propriedade fornece controle mais granular sobre os elementos dentro de um `location` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The configuration setting of the element or group can be overridden by configuration settings that are in child directories.
The configuration setting of the element or group cannot be overridden by configuration settings that are in child directories.

The configuration setting of the element or group will be overridden by configuration settings that are in child directories if explicitly allowed by a parent element of the current configuration element or group.
Permission to override is specified by using the <see langword="OverrideMode" /> attribute.
